Header.Welcome: Welcome to ViVi Media and Entertainment Joint Stock Company

About.OurStoryContent: ViVi Media is a multi-platform digital media company with over 10 years of experience. We focus on producing, creating content and promoting entertainment products on digital platforms. Possessing a team of talented young people, we have been doing our best for a common goal of bringing global audiences different and exciting entertainment experiences.
About.OurGoalContent: Professional and experienced team in the field of media development on digital platforms

Job1.T1: Probation for 1 month with 80% of basic salary
Job1.T4: Bonuses for holidays and New Year

Services.Title: Services
Services.MusicDescription: We build independent music labels to support small and medium artists around the world. Through online music platforms (DSPs) such as: Spotify, Apple Music, Deezerâ€¦ we bring artists' music closer to music lovers around the world.
Services.YoutubeDescription: Youtube is the strong platform of HG Media. We have a lot of experience in deploying and building a methodical and exclusive channel system. With a deep understanding of the platform and user behavior, we have achieved many successes in the international market.
Services.TiktokDescription: The rise of Tiktok - a short-form video platform has opened up a unique creative space where we build a communication support system for projects, anticipate new, creative and innovative content trends. change every day.
Services.SocialTitle: Content development on the socical platform
Services.SocialDescription: We build communities of influence, coordinate entertainment trends, and create monetization models based on user behavior and the platform's algorithms.

Features.Title: Objectives
Features.Content1: Creative orientation, unique and high-quality music.
Features.Content2: Collaborating with our own music label for uniqueness and diversity.
Features.Content3: Expanding high-quality music sources for exceptional experiences.
Features.Content4: Collaborating with influential music partners to achieve success.
Features.Content5: Training potential employees to build a professional team.
Features.Content6: Creating value for society through music and art.
